basics.name: Xiaoxiao Qi
basics.title: Senior Data Scientist
basics.summary: I'm a Senior Data Scientist at Epsilon, with a focus on developing models and tools including machine learning algorithms for RTB bidding optimization. I got my Ph.D. in Biomedical Engineering from IIT in 2020, focusing on Medical Imaging Modeling & Optimization under the guidance Dr. Konstantinos Arfanakis.

work.name: Decision Science, Epsilon
work.summary: Developing models and tools including machine learning algorithms for RTB bidding optimization
highlights: Built the RTB bidding bid volume allocation strategies for different inventories
Designed and trained a copilot system to automate campaign management

education.institution: Illinois Institute of Technology, Chicago, United States
courses: Thesis: Development of Human Brain Atlas Resources
Project Page: IIT Human Brain Atals (v.5.0) and Regionnconnect (https://www.nitrc.org/frs/?group_id=432

Courses: Applied Optimization for Engineers, Computer Vision and Image Processing, Machine Learning, Data Structures and Algorithms, Biomedical Informatics, Numerical Methods in Biomedical Engineering, Finite Element Method, Neuroimaging, Analysis of Random Signals, Biostatistics

skills.name: Programming
keywords: Python, SQL, Shell, Java and Matlab

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
